WorkItem.ClosedComment: Near tool for roads is done.
WorkItem.Description: Create a score tool similar to the power line distance tool, which calculates the distance to nearby roads. Optionally, also include a tool to calculate distance to rail (should the data be available and seem useful).

Comments.Message: This has been worked on (by both Rohit and Justin). I'mÂ marking it Active, and assigning it out.

The Road access tool is functional though it computes the distance from the centroid of created site to the nearest waterway. The rail access tool is on my list and I will have to come back to it in a few days.
